org.kohsuke.args4j

Interface CmdLineOptionsProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Aligners.AnyAligner, ByteKMeansInitialisers, ClusterType, FaceDetectors.AnyBasicFImageDetector, GlobalFeatureType, ImageCollectionProcessorMode, ImageCollectionProcessorMode, InputMode, LocalFeatureMode, OutputListenerMode, RecognitionStrategy, RegexEngineMode, ShapeFeatures, SimilarityMatrixToolOptions.Mode, SplitModeOption, TopologyModeOption, TrendDetectorFeatureMode, TwitterOutputModeOption, TwitterPreprocessingFilterOption, TwitterPreprocessingModeOption, TwitterTokenModeOption, TwitterTokenOutputModeOption

    public interface CmdLineOptionsProvider
    Interface for objects that have associated objects that can provide args4j options and arguments.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
